metrobotics
Class Robot

java.lang.Object
  metrobotics.Robot

public class Robot
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
Pablo Munoz - Metrobotics This class contains the structure for the Robot object. It is worth noticing that it has fields that are used when connecting the Central Server, and other fields that are needed when connecting to Player or directly to each Robot.
